package.name: kmod
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 2 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" ./configure --prefix=/usr --bindir=/bin --libdir=/lib --sysconfdir=/etc --with-xz --with-zlib --disable-manpages CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" make -j $jobcount CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" else ./configure --prefix=/usr --bindir=/bin --libdir=/lib --sysconfdir=/etc --with-xz --with-zlib --disable-manpages make fi
package.install: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/sbin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib make install DESTDIR=${TGTDIR} for target in depmod insmod modinfo modprobe rmmod; do ln -sv ../bin/kmod ${TGTDIR}/sbin/$target done mv ${TGTDIR}/lib/pkgconfig ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/ ln -sv kmod ${TGTDIR}/bin/lsmod
